item.title: Vampire: the Masquerade – Bloodlines 2 ‘A Betting Man’ trailer
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/10/vampire-the-masquerade-bloodlines-2-a-betting-man-trailer

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Meet the personalities behind the Camarilla Court.

Publisher Paradox Interactive and developer The Chinese Room have released a new trailer for Vampire: the Masquerade – Bloodlines 2 introducing Camarilla Court personalities Benny, Tolly, Safia, and Lou.

“While the Camarilla Court has its personalities, the trailer’s vibe is perfect for spooky season as viewers get a glimpse of how Seattle’s Kindred interact with players,” reads the announcement accompanying the trailer. “Between Benny’s potty mouth, Tolly’s quirks, Safia’s flighty nature, and Lou’s demanding presence, players must learn how to interact with them to get precisely what they need.”

Vampire: the Masquerade – Bloodlines 2 is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, and GOG in the first half of 2025.
